name: Parvink
rules: Protector; When Parvink enters play, draw a card.
flavour: Tauren warriors stand between their allies and death. Gnomes keep death from walking that far.

name: Orders From Lady Vashj
rules: Pay 2 to complete this quest.;Reward: If you have no cards in hand, draw two cards.
flavour: This letter contains detailed orders to the Coilfang naga operating the steam vaults... The orders bear the seal of the infamous Lady Vashj. - Ysiel Windsinger

name: Offender Gora
rules: Ferocity; Gora has -2 ATK during each opponent's turn.
flavour: Patience is not a traditional value of the orcs.

name: Nether Fracture
rules: Interrupt target ability, ally, or equipment card.

name: Myriam Starcaller
rules: Untargetable; [Exhaust] -> Myriam deals 5 arcane damage to target hero.
flavour: The moon is full tonight. This does not bode well for you.

name: Moonfire
rules: Attach to target hero or ally, and your hero deals 1 arcane damage to it.;Ongoing: At the start of your turn, if Moonfire is in play, your hero deals 1 arcane damage to attached character.;1 -> Put Moonfire into its owner's hand.
flavour: In all other things, moderation.

name: Leeroy Jenkins
rules: When Leeroy Jenkins enters play, exhaust all other allies in your party. They can't ready during your next ready step.; Say Leeeerooooy Jenkins! -> Leeroy has Ferocity this turn.
flavour: Let's do this!

name: Lady Vashj
rules: Traitor Hero Required; At the end of each turn, roll a die. Put that many Naga ally tokens with 1 Melee ATK / 1 health into play.
flavour: Victory to Lord Illidan!

name: Fizzle
rules: Interrupt target ability card with cost 3 or less.
flavour: It's the last thing you'll never say.

name: Deafening Shout
rules: Ongoing: Opposing allies have -3 ATK / -3 health.
flavour: The strong lay down only their weapons. The weak lay down their lives.

name: Counterspell
rules: Interrupt target ability card.
reprinted: Heroes of Azeroth,Assault on Icecrown Citadel,Class Starter Deck 2010,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring),Archive
flavour: No voodoo for you, mon. - Ta'zo

name: Corki's Ransom
rules: Put Corki's Ransom into its owner's hand and pay 2 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card.
flavour: It says that they have Corki and if we don't cooperate, they're going to eat him. - Arechron

name: Bloodsoul
rules: Bloodsoul can attack only heroes.
reprinted: March of the Legion,Class Starter Deck 2010,Archive
flavour: Doom comes for you, and it takes pleasure in your resistance.

name: A'dal
rules: Prevent all damage that would be dealt.
flavour: (You are safe here.)

name: A Question of Gluttony
rules: You pay 1 less to complete this quest for each card in your hand.; Pay 7 to complete this card.;Reward: Draw a card.

name: Solanian's Belongings
rules: Pay 4 to complete this quest.;Reward: Choose one: Put an ability card from your graveyard on top of your deck; or draw a card. If your hero is a Blood Elf, you may choose both.

name: Tatulla the Reclaimer
rules: When Tatulla enters play, target player destroys an ability or equipment he controls.
flavour: All things created must return back to the earth.

name: The Bringer of Death
rules: 3, [Exhaust], Destroy The Bringer of Death -> Destroy all abilities, allies, and equipment. Use only on your turn.

name: Twig of the World Tree
rules: Destroy one of your resources -> You pay 3 less the next time you strike with Twig of the World Tree this turn.
flavour: Great power pulses and hums beneath the bark of such a simple branch.

name: Varimathras
rules: At the end of your turn, Varimathras deals 5 shadow damage to target opposing heor or ally. When that character is destroyed this turn, its controller discards a card.
flavour: I'm always on the winning side.

name: Warbringer Arix'amal
rules: Other Demons have +2 ATK.

name: Waz'luk
rules: When Waz'luk enters play, he deals 1 fire damage to target hero.
reprinted: Through the Dark Portal,Class Starter Deck 2010,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring),Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall),Champion Decks,Archive
flavour: He makes quite a first impression.

name: Weeble
rules: Protector; When Weeble enters play, draw two cards.
flavour: Many foes have fallen to Weeble's wrath.

name: Wraith Scythe
rules: When your hero deals combat damage, it heals that amount of damage from itself.

name: Crackling Purge
rules: Destroy target ability. If it wasn't attached to a friendly hero or ally, your hero may deal nature damage to its controller's hero equal to its cost.
flavour: To be honest, that wasn't quite what I had in mind. - Black Ice Fizzlefreeze

name: Explosive Trap
rules: Trap (You may exhaust your defending hero rather than pay this card's cost.) Destroy target attacking ally. If you do, exhaust all other heroes and allies in its party.

name: Maiev Shadowsong
rules: Loyal Hero Required; Elusive, Ferocity, Long-Range, Protector, Stealth, Untargetable
flavour: My long hunt is finally over. Today, justice will be done!

name: Mental Anguish
rules: Target player discards two cards.
flavour: It may all be in your head, but that doesn't make it hurt any less.

name: Mortal Strike
rules: Arms Hero Required;.; Your hero deals X melee damage to target hero or ally, where X is 1 plus the ATK of one of your Melee weapons. That character can't be healed this turn.

name: Gromble the Apt
rules: Find Treasure (When this ally enters play, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.);Your hero can be exhausted to pay costs as though it were a resource.

name: Vexmaster Nar'jo
rules: Ferocity (Can attack immediately.); Nar'jo has +2 ATK while attacking a ready ally.
reprinted: Servants of the Betrayer,Servants of the Betrayer (EA)
flavour: Stand still, mon. It be over soon.

name: The Ring of Blood: The Warmaul Champion
rules: As a cost to place this quest face up, put the top three cards of your deck into your graveyard.; Pay 3 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card.

name: The Ring of Blood: Brokentoe
rules: As a cost to play this face up, discard a card.; Pay 3 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw two cards.

name: The Natural Order
rules: Destroy target ability or equipment.
reprinted: Servants of the Betrayer,Class Starter Deck 2010,Servants of the Betrayer (EA)
flavour: It is nature's will to provide balance.

name: The Defias Brotherhood
rules: While there are four or more allies in your party, pay 1 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw two cards.
flavour: There is but one task left for you to complete. Edwin VanCleef must be assassinated. — Gryan Stoutmantle

name: Tatulla the Reclaimer
rules: When Tatulla enters play, target player destroys an ability or equipment he controls.
flavour: All things created must return back to the earth.

name: Swift Discipline
rules: During your turn, pay 1 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card, and target opponent puts a Boar ally token with 1 ATK and 1 health into play.
flavour: Now I want you to go back to my two dimwitted students and discipline them using this wand. - Instructor Antheol

name: Storm Shock
rules: Target Opponent chooses a hero or ally in his party, and your hero deals 4 nature damage to it.

name: Stoneclaw Totem
rules: Ongoing: Opposing heroes and allies can attack only Stoneclaw Totem if able.; When a hero or ally deals combat damage to Stoneclaw Totem, that character can't ready during its controller's next ready step.; (Totems can be attacked or targeted like allies)

name: Spell Suppression
rules: Attach to target ability, ally, equipment, or resource.;Ongoing: Attached card loses and can't have powers.
flavour: I hope you weren't relying on that to defeat me. - Spellweaver Jihan

name: Solanian's Belongings
rules: Pay 4 to complete this quest.;Reward: Choose one: Put an ability card from your graveyard on top of your deck; or draw a card. If your hero is a Blood Elf, you may choose both.

name: Snipe
rules: When the next ability, ally, or equipment enters play this turn, destroy it.
flavour: The first shot is always the most important. - Shaii

name: Smash
rules: Destroy target equipment. If you do, your hero deals melee damage to its controller's hero equal to its cost.
reprinted: Servants of the Betrayer,Servants of the Betrayer (EA)
flavour: The first rule of warfare? Remove the enemy's ability to make war. - Lionar, Unbound.

name: Skumm Bag'go
rules: When Skumm enters play, you may turn target resource face down.
flavour: I've sent in someone special to handle de peasants. She's de best dere is - supposedly. - Kuray'bin

name: Shadow Word: Death
rules: Your hero deals 3 shadow damage to target hero or ally. Is that character doesn't have fatal damage on it, put 3 damage on your hero.
reprinted: Through the Dark Portal,War of the Elements,Class Starter Deck 2010
flavour: As words go, it's frequently the last.

name: Scrapper Ironbane
rules: At the end of your turn, you may destroy target equipment.
flavour: That's for my brother!

name: Sarmoth
rules: Opposing heroes and allies that can attack Sarmoth can attack only Sarmoth.
reprinted: Heroes of Azeroth,Class Starter Deck 2010,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring),Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall)
flavour: Voidwalkers do not fear pain, so they are popular with warlocks who do.

name: Sacred Purification
rules: Destroy target ability. If it was attached to a friendly hero or ally, draw a card.

name: Purloin
rules: Look at target opponent's hand and choose an ability or equipment card. That opponent discards that card.
flavour: It's not like you really need that gold.

name: Puncture
rules: Destroy target ally or equipment.
reprinted: March of the Legion,March of the Legion (EA)

name: Pick Pocket
rules: Name a card, and then target opponent reveals his hand and discards all cards with that name.
flavour: Leeroy?

name: Parvink
rules: Protector; When Parvink enters play, draw a card.
flavour: Tauren warriors stand between their allies and death. Gnomes keep death from walking that far.

name: Orders From Lady Vashj
rules: Pay 2 to complete this quest.;Reward: If you have no cards in hand, draw two cards.
flavour: This letter contains detailed orders to the Coilfang naga operating the steam vaults... The orders bear the seal of the infamous Lady Vashj. - Ysiel Windsinger

name: Nether Fracture
rules: Interrupt target ability, ally, or equipment card.

name: Myriam Starcaller
rules: Untargetable; [Exhaust] -> Myriam deals 5 arcane damage to target hero.
flavour: The moon is full tonight. This does not bode well for you.

name: Munkin Blackfist
rules: Protector;When Munkin enters play, destroy target equipment if its controller has more equipment than you.
flavour: Greed is good.

name: Mental Anguish
rules: Target player discards two cards.
flavour: It may all be in your head, but that doesn't make it hurt any less.

name: Melt Face
rules: Target player destroys an ally in his party.
reprinted: Servants of the Betrayer,Class Starter Deck 2010,Servants of the Betrayer (EA)
flavour: Some priests heal; others enhance. I, however, melt faces! - Omedus the Punisher

name: Lightning Arc
rules: Your hero deals 3 nature damage divided as you choose to any number of target heroes and/or allies.
reprinted: Hunt For Illidan,Class Starter Deck 2010,Hunt For Illidan (EA)
flavour: Stand together and face me! - Zaritha

name: Hootie
rules: Opposing heroes and allies have -1 ATK.
reprinted: Through the Dark Portal,Through the Dark Portal (EA)
flavour: He doesn't mean it when he blocks your view.

name: Hibernate
rules: Put target non-token ally into its owner's resource row face down, then exhaust it.
flavour: Let sleeping beasts lie. - Eriun Moonglow

name: Hammer of Justice
rules: Exhaust target hero or ally. It can't ready during its controller's next ready step.; Draw a card.
reprinted: Heroes of Azeroth,Assault on Icecrown Citadel,Class Starter Deck 2010,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring),Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall)
flavour: Justice in Azeroth is in short supply, but merciless when it does arrive.

name: Forces of Jaedenar
rules: If you played an ability this turn, pay 1 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card.
reprinted: March of the Legion,March of the Legion (EA)

name: Fire Blast
rules: Your hero deals 2 fire damage to target hero or ally.
reprinted: Heroes of Azeroth,Worldbreaker,Assault on Icecrown Citadel,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring),Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall),Class Starter Deck 2010

name: Falling to Corruption
rules: Destroy two of your resources and pay 1 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw two cards.
reprinted: March of the Legion,March of the Legion (EA)

name: Eye of the Storm
rules: When you play a card, add an honor counter.;[Exhaust], Remove four honor counters ->Exhaust up to four target heroes and/or allies.

name: Eye of Kilrogg
rules: Look at target opponent's hand and choose a card. Remove that card from the game.
flavour: The Eye was named in honor of Kilrogg Deadeye, chieftain of the Bleeding Hollow clan.

name: Engulfing Blaze
rules: Your hero deals 3 fire damage to each hero and ally.
flavour: I know what I'm doing! Just keep the priests ready!

name: Elements' Fury
rules: Your hero deals 3 nature damage to target hero and 3 nature damage to target ally.
reprinted: March of the Legion,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall),Champion Decks

name: Cyclone
rules: Attach to target hero or ally, and put three wind counters on Cyclone.; Ongoing: Attached character can't attack or protect.; At the start of your turn, remove a wind counter from Cyclone. If you removed the last one, destroy Cyclone.
reprinted: Through the Dark Portal,Through the Dark Portal (EA)
flavour: Gentle breezes seldom stay that way for long.

name: Cromarius Blackfist
rules: When Cromarius enters play, destroy target opposing ability if its controller has more abilities than you.
flavour: I envy you. But such a thing is not meant to last.

name: Corki's Ransom
rules: Put Corki's Ransom into its owner's hand and pay 2 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card.
flavour: It says that they have Corki and if we don't cooperate, they're going to eat him. - Arechron

name: Chipper Ironbane
rules: X, Destroy Chipper Ironbane -> Destroy target ability or equipment with cost X.
reprinted: Through the Dark Portal,Through the Dark Portal (EA)
flavour: I never let a little thing like armor slow me down.

name: Bloodsoul
rules: Bloodsoul can attack only heroes.
reprinted: March of the Legion,Class Starter Deck 2010,Archive (EA)
flavour: Doom comes for you, and it takes pleasure in your resistance.

name: Bloody Ritual
rules: As an additional cost to play, put 4 damage on your hero.;Draw four cards.

name: Blood Knight Kyria
rules: Protector; When you play an ability, Kyria heals 4 damage from target hero or ally.
flavour: Death to all who oppose the blood elves!

name: Blessing of Freedom
rules: Attach to target hero or ally in your party.; Ongoing: Attached character is Untargetable.; At end of turn, destroy Blessing of Freedom.
flavour: Those who walk the path of the righteous ned not fear restraint.

name: Banish to the Nether
rules: Remove target ability, ally, or equipment from game.; Ongoing: When Banish to the Nether leaves play, the owner of that removed card puts that card into play.
reprinted: Servants of the Betrayer,Servants of the Betrayer (EA)
flavour: Those who enter the Nether rarely return.

name: Apprentice Teep
rules: Elusive (Can't be Attacked)
reprinted: Heroes of Azeroth,Class Starter Deck 2010,Heroes of Azeroth (EA),Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring)

name: Apprentice Merry
rules: Untargetable
flavour: For some reason Merry never made much of a first impression - or much of any impression at all.

name: Akama's Promise
rules: Loyal Hero Required; (Can't put this into your deck if your hero is a Traitor.); Pay 1 for each card in your hand to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card.
flavour: Take this as my promise to you that when the time comes and you face Illidan, I will be on your side.

name: A Question of Gluttony
rules: You pay 1 less to complete this quest for each card in your hand.; Pay 7 to complete this card.;Reward: Draw a card.

name: A Final Blow
rules: If you played an equipment this turn, pay 1 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card.

name: Xela the Tormentor
rules: When Xela enters play, you may put a Pet card from your graveyard into play if its cost is less than or equal to the number of resources you have.
flavour: It will not be I who fights you.

name: Wraith Scythe
rules: When your hero deals combat damage, it heals that amount of damage from itself.

name: Water Elemental
rules: Frost Hero Required; [Exhaust] -> Water Elemental deals 1 frost damage to each opposing hero and ally. A character dealt damage this way can't attack this turn.

name: Voidfire Wand
rules: When combat damage is dealt with Voidfire Wand to a hero, the next time that hero's controller would draw a card, he skips drawing it instead.
reprinted: Servants of the Betrayer,Servants of the Betrayer (EA)

name: Varimathras
rules: At the end of your turn, Varimathras deals 5 shadow damage to target opposing heor or ally. When that character is destroyed this turn, its controller discards a card.
flavour: I'm always on the winning side.

name: Twig of the World Tree
rules: Destroy one of your resources -> You pay 3 less the next time you strike with Twig of the World Tree this turn.
flavour: Great power pulses and hums beneath the bark of such a simple branch.

name: Totemic Mastery
rules: Restoration Hero Required; Ongoing: Your Totems have +3 health.
flavour: Strong tools make great craftsmen. - Ringleader Kuma

name: The Lich King
rules: Scourge or [Death Knight] Hero Required; At the start of each player's turn, put target ally from that player's graveyard into play under your control. Allies you control are also Scourge allies.
flavour: I will show you the justice of the grave...and the true meaning of fear.

name: The Bringer of Death
rules: 3, [Exhaust], Destroy The Bringer of Death -> Destroy all abilities, allies, and equipment. Use only on your turn.

name: Thunderfury, Blessed Blade of the Windseeker
rules: When you strike with Thunderfury, choose up to five heroes and/or allies. Your hero deals 5, 4, 3, 2, and 1 nature damage to them, respectively.
reprinted: Through the Dark Portal,Through the Dark Portal (EA)
flavour: The fury of Thunderaan rages between the folded metal.

name: Terokk's Shadowstaff
rules: 2, Destroy Terokk's Shadowstaff -> Target opponent chooses an ally in his party, and you gain control of it.
flavour: Clutching this staff and gripped by madness, Talon King Ikiss proclaimed himself Terokk reborn.

name: Survival Instincts
rules: Survival Hero Required; Ongoing: Prevent the first 4 damage that would be dealt to your hero each turn.
flavour: A hunter worth his weight in arrows knows to be prepared when the hunt turns on him. - Morn Walks-the-Path

name: Stronghold Gauntlets
rules: Your weapons have +1 ATK and can't be targeted by opponents.
flavour: Hold onto your weapon as you would your own life.

name: Spirit Healer
rules: Ongoing: At the end of each player's turn, that player may put an ally card from his graveyard into play with damage on it equal to its health minus 1.
flavour: It is not yet your time. I shall aid your journey back to the realm of the living.

name: Shadowburn
rules: Destruction Hero Required; As an additional cost to play Shadowburn, destroy one of your resources.; Your hero deals 4 shadow damage to target hero or ally. When that character is destroyed this turn, put the top card of your deck into your resource row face down and exhausted.

name: Seer's Signet
rules: Scryer Reputation; Your hero has Sabotage: Ability or equipment.; When your hero sabotages a card, destroy it.
flavour: We work in the shadows and lies. - Spymaster Thalodien

name: Rapid Fire
rules: Whenever you strike with a Ranged weapon this turn, you may pay 1. If you do, ready that weapon and your hero.

name: Pummel
rules: You may exhaust one of your Melee weapons rather than pay Pummel's cost.; Interrupt target ability card.
flavour: The first, best solution to anything.

name: Predatory Gloves
rules: When Predatory Gloves enters play, target opponent discards a card and you draw a card.
flavour: In nature there is give and take. Predators take, even when the prey refuses to give.

name: Portal
rules: Search your deck for an ally card, reveal it, and put it into your hand.
flavour: The shortest distance between two points is one incantation. - Blaize Brightspark

name: Overkill
rules: As an additional cost to play, remove up to five Finishing Move cards from your graveyard from the game.; Each opponent destroys that many of his equipment and discards that many cards, and your hero deals that much melee damage to each opposing hero and ally.

name: Ossus the Ancient
rules: Draenei Hero Required;Inspiring Presence; Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt.

name: Naliss the Silencer
rules: Blood Elf Hero Required; Arcane Torrent; 1 -> Target opposing card in play loses and can't have powers this turn.

name: Mortal Strike
rules: Arms Hero Required;.; Your hero deals X melee damage to target hero or ally, where X is 1 plus the ATK of one of your Melee weapons. That character can't be healed this turn.

name: Moonfire
rules: Attach to target hero or ally, and your hero deals 1 arcane damage to it.;Ongoing: At the start of your turn, if Moonfire is in play, your hero deals 1 arcane damage to attached character.;1 -> Put Moonfire into its owner's hand.
flavour: In all other things, moderation.

name: Marksman Glous
rules: Aldor Reputation;Inspire: Quest; When a quest is inspired this way, you pay 1 less to complete it this turn.
reprinted: Servants of the Betrayer,Servants of the Betrayer (EA)
flavour: To do what needs to be done, you have to know where to do it.

name: Maiev Shadowsong
rules: Loyal Hero Required; Elusive, Ferocity, Long-Range, Protector, Stealth, Untargetable
flavour: My long hunt is finally over. Today, justice will be done!

name: Lowdown Luppo Shadefizzle
rules: Gnome Hero Required; Elusive, Stealth, Untargetable
reprinted: Through the Dark Portal,Through the Dark Portal (EA)
flavour: Lowdown means more than just height.

name: Lightwarden's Band
rules: Aldor Reputation; Your hero has Inspire: Ability, ally, equipment, hero, or resource.
flavour: We are keepers of the Light. - Ishanah, High Priestess of the Aldor

name: Leeroy Jenkins
rules: When Leeroy Jenkins enters play, exhaust all other allies in your party. They can't ready during your next ready step.; Say Leeeerooooy Jenkins! -> Leeroy has Ferocity this turn.
flavour: Let's do this!

name: Lay on Hands
rules: Your hero heals all damage from target hero or ally. Exhaust all of your resources. Skip your next turn.
flavour: Take all my strength into you and be whole once more!

name: Lady Vashj
rules: Traitor Hero Required; At the end of each turn, roll a die. Put that many Naga ally tokens with 1 Melee ATK / 1 health into play.
flavour: Victory to Lord Illidan!

name: Lady Katrana Prestor
rules: Traitor Hero Required; 15 -> Remove all of your cards in all zones from the game and start an Onyxia Raid.
reprinted: Servants of the Betrayer,Servants of the Betrayer (EA)
flavour: This world has enough heroes.

name: Jubilee Arcspark
rules: Untargetable;When Jubilee Arcspark is revealed from your deck by a quest, draw a card.
flavour: Jubilee has a knack for turning up in all the right places.

name: Jin'do's Evil Eye
rules: At the start of each player's turn, the first opponent to that player's left names a card. That card can't be played this turn.
flavour: Even when it is hidden away, I can feel its gaze upon me.

name: Invoke the Nether
rules: Remove all allies from the game.
reprinted: March of the Legion,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall),March of the Legion (EA)
flavour: It all ends here. - Forang Deathrattle

name: Insect Swarm
rules: Balance Hero Required; Attach to target hero or ally, and your hero deals 2 nature damage to it.; Ongoing: Attached character has -2 ATK.
flavour: Annoying at first, deadly at last.

name: Imp Mistress Noali
rules: Your face-down resources are also Imp Demon allies with 1 ATK / 1 health.
flavour: I command you, my minions! Wash over the enemy like a sea of fire and burn them from this plane!

name: Holy Shock
rules: Holy Hero Required; Prevent the next 4 damage that target friendly hero or ally would be dealt this turn.; Your hero deals 4 unpreventable holy damage to target opposing hero or ally.
reprinted: Hunt For Illidan,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring),Hunt For Illidan (EA)

name: Holy Nova
rules: Holy Hero Required; Your hero deals 1 unpreventable holy damage to each opposing hero and ally and heals 1 damage from each friendly hero and ally.

name: Greatsword of Horrid Dreams
rules: As an ally enters play under an opponent's control, it loses and can't have powers until the start of that opponent's next turn.

name: Fury
rules: Ferocity
flavour: A faint rustling of brush, a whirlwind of tooth and claw - and silence. Such is the fate of Fury's prey.

name: Faces from the Past
rules: Put any number of target ally cards from your graveyard into play if their combined cost is less than or equal to the number of resources you have.

name: Evasion
rules: Ongoing: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to your hero.
flavour: Even if you see a rogue, there's no guarantee your strikes will, too.

name: Earth Shock
rules: Your hero deals 4 nature damage to target hero or ally. If you targeted a hero, you may interrupt an ability card played by its controller.
reprinted: Fires of Outland,Class Starter Deck 2010,Fires of Outland (EA)
flavour: Concussion beats concentration.

name: Earth Elemental Totem
rules: Totem (Can be attacked or targeted like an ally.); Put an Earth Elemental ally token with 2 ATK, 2 health, and protector into play.; Ongoing
flavour: I have conscripted the very land to fight.

name: Dread Infernal
rules: When Dread Infernal enters or leaves play, he deals 1 fire damage to each opposing hero and ally.
reprinted: Servants of the Betrayer,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring)
flavour: When the smoke cleared, I wished it hadn't. - Warden Stormclaw

name: Doomwalker
rules: When an opposing ability, ally, or equipment becomes exhausted, destroy it.
flavour: Do not proceed. You will be eliminated.

name: Deafening Shout
rules: Ongoing: Opposing allies have -3 ATK / -3 health.
flavour: The strong lay down only their weapons. The weak lay down their lives.

name: Counterspell
rules: Interrupt target ability card.
reprinted: Heroes of Azeroth,Assault on Icecrown Citadel,Class Starter Deck 2010,Archive (EA),Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring)
flavour: No voodoo for you, mon. - Ta'zo

name: Champion Zosimuus
rules: When a Holy ally in your party is dealt damage, it deals 2 holy damage to the source of that damage.
flavour: Retribution is swift upon the enemies of the Light.

name: Blessing of Wisdom
rules: Attach to target hero or ally.; Ongoing: Attached character has [Exhaust] -> Draw a card.

name: Battlemage Vyara
rules: Scryer Reputation; You may exhaust Vyara rather than pay the cost of an ability with cost 7 or less, or a weapon's strike cost of 7 or less.
flavour: The survival of the Scryers hinges on outrecruiting Kael'thas.

name: Barkskin
rules: Ongoing: Your ability, ally, and equipment cards can't be interrupted.

name: Band of the Inevitable
rules: X, Destroy Band of the Inevitable -> Destroy each equipment with cost X or less. Use only on your turn.
flavour: Inexorable, unavoidable, inescapable…

name: Azaloth
rules: When Azaloth enters play, choose an opponent.; That opponent puts five Warlock ally tokens with 0 Shadow ATK / 5 health into play.; Azaloth can't attack while any of those tokens are in play.
flavour: Find a way to let him loose on his captors. - Exarch Onaala

name: ALAMO
rules: OK, LISSEN, UDDER FRENDLY DURIDS HAF +1 FITE / +1 HEELTH. ; (Alamo is a Druid. Other friendly Druids have +1 ATK / +1 health.)
flavour: CAT DURID IS 4 FITE!

name: Adrenaline Rush
rules: Combat Hero Required; Ready all of your resources. Draw cards until you reach your maximum hand size. At end of turn, discard your hand.
reprinted: March of the Legion,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring)
flavour: Let'sget'em! Whatarewewaitingfor? Gogogo!

name: A Taste of Divinity
rules: Your hero deals 2 unpreventable holy damage to target ally. If that ally doesn't have fatal damage, put A Taste of Divinity into its owner's hand.

name: A'dal
rules: Prevent all damage that would be dealt.
flavour: (You are safe here.)

name: Victimize
rules: Target player discards two cards and you draw two cards.

name: Waz'luk
rules: When Waz'luk enters play, he deals 1 fire damage to target hero.
reprinted: Through the Dark Portal,Class Starter Deck 2010,Archive (EA),Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring),Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall),Champion Decks
flavour: He makes quite a first impression.

name: Weeble
rules: Protector; When Weeble enters play, draw two cards.
flavour: Many foes have fallen to Weeble's wrath.

name: Wrath
rules: Your hero deals 3 nature damage to target hero or ally.
reprinted: Through the Dark Portal,Worldbreaker,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring),Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall),Class Starter Deck 2010
flavour: Nature's fury is awesome to behold.

name: Abyss Walker's Boots
rules: [Exhaust] -> Remove target card in a graveyard from the game.

name: Annihilator
rules: Combat damage dealt by your hero with Annihilator can't be prevented.

name: Antikron the Unyielding
rules: Protector; Put 2 damage on your hero -> Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to Antikron this combat. Use only if he's defending.
reprinted: Servants of the Betrayer,Servants of the Betrayer (EA)

name: Arcanite Dragonling
rules: 1 -> Arcanite Dragonling is also an ally with 2 [Melee] ATK / 2 health and Protector this turn.
flavour: The next best thing to an Onyxian Whelp

name: Bolton
rules: Long-Range (Defenders deal no combat damage to this character.)

name: Bonefist Gauntlets
rules: [Exhaust] -> You pay 2 less the next time you strike with a weapon this turn.

name: Brelnor Mindbender
rules: When Brelnor enters play, gain control of target ally while Brelnor remains in your party.
flavour: Yer powers are weak!

name: Brok Bloodcaller
rules: Ferocity; At the end of your turn, destroy Brok if he's undamaged.
flavour: The time between fights is the time to find a fight.

name: Carnage
rules: Destroy each opposing ally with cost 4 or less.

name: Crackling Purge
rules: Destroy target ability. If it wasn't attached to a friendly hero or ally, your hero may deal nature damage to its controller's hero equal to its cost.
flavour: To be honest, that wasn't quite what I had in mind. - Black Ice Fizzlefreeze

name: Deathblow
rules: Finishing Move (To play, remove X Combo cards in your graveyard from the game, where X is 5 or less.)

name: Devil-Stitched Leggings
rules: 3, Exhaust your hero -> Target hero or ally has -3 health this turn.
reprinted: March of the Legion,March of the Legion (EA)

name: Dispel Magic
rules: Destroy target ability.
reprinted: Heroes of Azeroth,Class Starter Deck 2010,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring)
flavour: A fool and her blessings are soon parted.

name: Doshura Risestrider
rules: Protector; When Doshura enters play, you may destroy target exhausted ally.
reprinted: March of the Legion,March of the Legion (EA)
flavour: May the Earth Mother grant us her blessing and lend us the strength to protect her children.

name: Dryad's Wrist Bindings
rules: [Exhaust], Destroy one of your resources -> Draw a card.

name: Enduring Shout
rules: Ongoing: While exactly one ally is in your party, it has +2 ATK / +2 health and is a Protector.
flavour: Joo got dat wrong, mon. A good offense is da best defense.

name: Explosive Trap
rules: Trap (You may exhaust your defending hero rather than pay this card's cost.) Destroy target attacking ally. If you do, exhaust all other heroes and allies in its party.

name: Eye of Rend
rules: Your weapons have +1 ATK.
flavour: The Eye is said to reveal even the most obscured weaknesses of a foe.

name: Field Repair Bot 74A
rules: Friendly heros have 1, [Exhaust] -> Put an equipment card from your graveyard into your hand.
flavour: Successful raiders never leave home without it.

name: Finishing Shout
rules: Ongoing: Allies in your party have +1 ATK / +1 health.; Opposing allies have -1 ATK / -1 health.
flavour: The end is night!

name: Fizzle
rules: Interrupt target ability card with cost 3 or less.
flavour: It's the last thing you'll never say.

name: Greater Heal
rules: Your hero heals 14 damage from target hero or ally.
reprinted: Through the Dark Portal,Class Starter Deck 2010
flavour: As long as you're not dead, you'll be as good as new.

name: Gromble the Apt
rules: Find Treasure (When this ally enters play, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.);Your hero can be exhausted to pay costs as though it were a resource.

name: Grounding Totem
rules: Ongoing: Opposing cards and effects must target Grounding Totem if able.
flavour: The elements will ensure our safe passage. - Zorin

name: Heroic Strike
rules: Your weapons have +3 ATK this turn.
flavour: A warrior's blade finds its mark as much by will as by skill.

name: Johnny Rotten
rules: When Johnny enters play, he may deal 3 melee damage to target exhausted hero or ally.;Shadow Resistance (Prevent all shadow or [Shadow] damage that this ally would be dealt.)

name: Katianna the Shrouded
rules: 1, Flip Katianna -> Heroes and allies in your party are Elusive this turn.
flavour: Elune will not see harm come to those who are faithful.

name: Life Tap
rules: As an additional cost to play Life Tap, put 2 damage on your hero.; Draw two cards.
reprinted: Heroes of Azeroth,Class Starter Deck 2010,Heroes of Azeroth (EA),Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring),Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall)
flavour: When the dark arts cal for flesh, you can only trust your own.

name: Major Healing Potion
rules: 1, Destroy Major Healing Potion -> Your hero heals 5 damage from itself.
reprinted: Through the Dark Portal,Through the Dark Portal (EA)
flavour: It does a body good.

name: Mikael the Blunt
rules: When an opposing hero or ally readies, Mikael deals 2 ranged damage to it.

name: Netherbane
rules: Cards in play you control can't be removed from the game.
flavour: If the axe doesn't kill you, the glow will definitely blind you.

name: Offender Gora
rules: Ferocity; Gora has -2 ATK during each opponent's turn.
flavour: Patience is not a traditional value of the orcs.

name: Pack Tactics
rules: Ongoing: Allies in your party have +1 ATK / +1 health. Your hero is in cat form. (+1 ATK while attacking. Destroy this card when you strike with a weapon or play a non-Feral ability.)

name: Pappy Ironbane
rules: Protector; At the end of your turn, you may destroy target ability or equipment.

name: Rak Skyfury
rules: When Rak Skyfury enters play, ready your hero and one of your weapons.

name: Ras'fari Bloodfrenzy
rules: Ferocity (Can attack immediately.); When Ras'fari attacks for the first time each turn, ready him if he has damage.
reprinted: Servants of the Betrayer,Servants of the Betrayer (EA)
flavour: It hurts me, mon. But it'll hurt choo more.

name: Redemption
rules: Put target ally card from your graveyard into play if its cost is less than or equal to the number of resources you have. ; Draw a card.
reprinted: Fires of Outland,Assault on Icecrown Citadel,Class Starter Deck 2010,Fires of Outland (EA)
flavour: The Light conquers even the darkness of death. - Thatia Truthbringer

name: Retainer Marcus
rules: Scryer Reputation; When Marcus enters play, look at target player's hand and name a card in it.; That player can't play cards with that name.
flavour: I'd reconsider my options if I were you.

name: Roaring Blaze
rules: Your hero deals 1 fire damage to each opposing ally for each card in your hand.

name: Runesong Dagger
rules: When you draw a card, put a verse counter on Runesong Dagger.; 1, Remove three verse counters -> Your hero deals 3 arcane damage to target ally.
reprinted: March of the Legion,March of the Legion (EA)
flavour: Its lyrics are a chorus of death.

name: Shadow Bolt
rules: Your hero deals 3 shadow damage to target hero or ally.;When that character is destroyed this turn, its controller discards a card.
reprinted: Heroes of Azeroth,Class Starter Deck 2010,Heroes of Azeroth (EA),Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring),Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall)
flavour: May darkness take you, for when I'm done, the Light will not recognize you. - Radak Doombringer

name: Spark
rules: This turn, your hero has Exhaust a card in play you control -> This hero deals 1 fire damage to target hero or ally.

name: Steelsmith Joseph Carroll
rules: Steelsmith Joseph Carroll has +1 ATK and +1 health for each equipment you have.
reprinted: Through the Dark Portal,Through the Dark Portal (EA)

name: Sudden Death
rules: Traitor Hero Required; Destroy target ally without damage.
reprinted: Servants of the Betrayer,Servants of the Betrayer (EA)
flavour: Death comes quickly to the unprepared.

name: Surge of Adrenaline
rules: Finishing Move (To play, remove X Combo cards in your graveyard from the game, where X is 5 or less.);You pay X less to play Surge of Adrenaline.;Draw three cards.

name: The Missing Diplomat
rules: During your turn, pay 4 to complete this quest.;Reward: Search your deck for an ally card, reveal it, and put it into your hand.
flavour: Bishop DeLavey asked me to approach adventurers who might be able to help him with a delicate matter. — Thomas

name: The Taste of Arcana
rules: Your hero deals 1 arcane damage to target hero or ally. If you targeted a hero, you may interrupt a card played by its controller unless he pays 1 for each damage dealt this way.

name: Warbringer Arix'amal
rules: Other Demons have +2 ATK.

name: Whispering Blade of Slaying
rules: Your other daggers have +1 ATK.; Your hero has dual wield. (Can have a second one-handed Melee weapon instead of an Off-Hand equipment. Can strike with a second Melee weapon during the same combat.)
reprinted: March of the Legion,March of the Legion (EA)
flavour: The only sound you hear is the body hitting the ground.

name: Xanata the Lightsworn
rules: Aldor Reputation (Can't put Scryer cards in your deck.); Protector; If Xanata would be dealt combat damage while defending, prevent 2 of it.
reprinted: Servants of the Betrayer,Servants of the Betrayer (EA)

name: Black Ice Fizzlefreeze
rules: 1, Flip Black Ice -> Black Ice deals 1 frost damage to target hero or ally. A character dealt damage this way can't attack this turn.
flavour: Hey, stick around. I've got plans for you.

name: Daspien Bladedancer
rules: 5, Flip Daspien Bladedancer -> Daspien deals X melee damage to target hero or ally, where X is the combined ATK of your Melee weapons.
flavour: Whoever said you can't have too many weapons is a genius. Oh wait - that was me.

name: Dralor
rules: 4, Flip Dralor -> Look at target player's hand and choose an ally card. He discards that card. Use only on your turn.
flavour: Fewer witnesses. I like that.

name: Elendril
rules: 1, Flip Elendril -> Your Ranged weapons have +3 ATK this turn.
flavour: Elendril is most at home in the wilderness with only his tiger at his side.

name: Gorebelly
rules: 1, Flip Gorebelly -> You pay 3 less the next time you strike with a Melee weapon this turn.
flavour: Master of weapons. Devoid of mercy.

name: Graccus
rules: 3, Flip Graccus -> Prevent the next 3 damage that would be dealt to target hero or ally this turn.
flavour: The greatest battles are won not by strength of arm, but strength of will.

name: Halavar
rules: Flip Halavar -> You pay 1 less to play your next Two-Handed weapon this turn.
flavour: The Horde is prepared to meet any threat head on. Perhaps you'd like a demonstration?

name: Kil'zin of the Bloodscalp
rules: 1, Flip Kil'zin Kil'zin deals 3 nature damage to target hero or ally in an opponent's party. When damage is dealt this way, that opponent's hero deals 3 nature damage to target hero or ally of his choice.; Bloodscalp

name: Mother Misery
rules: Sextuple Wield (Can have up to six hands of Melee weapons and strike with any number of them during the same combat.);;Deckbuilding: You can include only neutral quests and any Melee weapons. You can't include cards with reputation or text restrictions (like Fire Hero Required).
flavour: The Legion is aware of you. That is why I am here.

name: Mythen of the Fang
rules: 2, Flip Mythen -> Mythen deals 1 nature damage to target hero for each quest its controller has.; Druids of the Fang

name: Nathadan
rules: 3, Flip Nathadan -> If target ally in your party is defending, remove it from combat.
flavour: I do not serve the Light. The Light serves me.

name: Obliveron
rules: You can have any number of Pets.;;Deckbuilding: You can include only neutral quests, any Traitor cards, and any Demon allies. You can't include cards with reputation or other text restrictions (like Fire Hero Required.)
flavour: Cower, mortals, and know the meaning of despair!

name: Pagatha Soulbinder
rules: 5, Flip Pagatha Soulbinder -> Interrupt target ally card.
flavour: Do you have the courage to seize what you desire? Are you willing to do whatever you must to achieve your goals?

name: Phadalus the Enlightened
rules: 3, Flip Phadalus -> Put a Totem card from your graveyard into your hand. Use only on your turn.
flavour: For so long, we knew only the ways of the Light. How wondrous it is to discover that nature itself can speak!

name: Pidge Filthfinder
rules: On your turn: 4, Flip Pidge -> Look at target player's hand and remove a card in it from the game.
flavour: Secrets are for sharing.

name: Ta'zo
rules: 3, Flip Ta'zo -> Ta'zo deals 3 fire damage to target hero or ally. Use only on your turn.
flavour: You play wit da fire, mon, you gonna get da burn!

name: Taheo Skyspeaker
rules: 4, Flip Taheo -> Choose one: Taheo deals 3 nature damage to target hero or ally; or Taheo heals 6 damage from target hero or ally. Use only on your turn.

name: The Longeye
rules: On your turn: 5, Flip The Longeye -> Destroy target opposing ally if it has or shares the highest cost among opposing allies.
flavour: Bigger is not always better, mon.

name: Witch Doctor Koo'zar
rules: 1, Flip Koo'zar -> Ready up to three target resources.
